sentences.sContent: He may be prosecuted for revealing secrets about the security agency.
sentences.sCn: 他可能因泄露安全部门的机密而被起诉。

sentences.sContent: a test that can reveal a teacher’s hidden skills
sentences.sCn: 能够展现老师潜在技能的测试

sentences.sContent: ...Results of USA WEEKEND'S Teens & Parents survey reveal a generation of young people who get along well with their parents and approve of the way they're being raised...
...we reveal just how deep this injustice runs...
...What it wants to reveal is that it is unwise to be totally dependent on one resource...
...What does James Pennebaker reveal in The Secret Life of Pronouns...
...What do Newsweek rankings reveal about women in Canada...
...Although surveys reveal the IDP process to be useful...
...Their work is already starting to reveal how the "Obama effect" is changing people's views and behaviour...
...Further experiments reveal that participants tend to respond with extra delay if they are required to do...

phrases.pCn: 显示全部（计算机操作命令）

remMethod.val: re(相反) ＋ veal(看作veil， 面纱) → 除去面纱 → 揭露， 展现

words.tran: 透露真情的；有启迪作用的；袒胸露肩的

trans.tranOther: to make known something that was previously secret or unknown
